text: Am I correct to believe you cannot hide modules in a global partial using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/hide-modules-and-sections|hiddenModules>? Templates only?

Hi Everyone, I have a custom testimonials module that I've added touch functionality to using jquery mobile. I've attempted to add the jqm script in the module with both long form and short form require_js statements, as well in the page header, but only the long form require tag works (with v1.5.0-alpha only), and when it does it is dynamically adding content to the bottom of the page. Has anyone else run into this, or has anyone successfully included jqm in a module? Appreciate any insight!

Hello everyone,

We've created a new header and footer that we want to implement across all pages in HubSpot. The challenge is that these pages (over 200), currently use various templates.

Is there a way to apply the new header and footer universally to all pages within HubSpot? I've spoken to HubSpot, and they've advised me to manually add the global header/footer to each template or theme one by one.

If any of you could suggest a workaround or guide me in the right direction, I would greatly appreciate it!

Regards,

CC: <@U06AGKNS5V3>
